title: Facebook temporarily bans ads, listings for medical face masks amid coronavirus outbreak
text: The social media giant said it will begin to enforce the temporary ban on these type of ads "over the next few days."

title: Facebook Ads Keep Driving Its Business , Says Author Steven Levy
text: Steven Levy, author of Facebook: The Inside Story, discusses the business of Facebook  on "Bloomberg Technology.

title: Facebook's transparency efforts around political ads fall short, study finds
text: Tens of thousands of Facebook pages that ran US political ads failed to disclose who paid for them.

title: How the coronavirus is impacting big tech
text: The coronavirus is escalating, and it's taking a toll on tech companies. Tech giants like Facebook, Microsoft, and Amazon have all confirmed coronavirus cases among their employees. Yahoo Finance’s Melody Hahm joins On the Move with the details.

title: Facebook takes down Trump ads for fake census ads
text: Facebook announced on Thursday that it was removing any misleading and incorrect ads about the 2020 census which were a part of President Trump’s re-election campaign.

title: Facebook commits to paying ‘contingent’ workers affected by corporate coronavirus response
text: Last night, in a move that all companies should look to emulate, Microsoft announced that it would continue to pay hourly workers impacted by office closures as the company responds to the coronavirus outbreak in the U.S. Now, Facebook appears to be following suit, according to a statement from the company: “We are working closely […]

title: Microsoft, Facebook, Google, Pledge to Pay Workers if Coronavirus Slowdown Emerges
text: Tech companies are stepping up as the coronavirus spreads in the U.S., agreeing to pay hourly workers normal wages amid business interruptions.

title: In Facebook groups, coronavirus misinformation thrives despite broader crackdown
text: Dozens of Facebook groups totaling hundreds of thousands of members have become a haven for conspiracy theories, medical equipment promotion and unproven cures.

title: Tech stocks long-term investors should watch amid market volatility
text: Mark Mahaney, RBC Capital Markets, and Mark Shmulik, Bernstein, join 'Squawk Alley' to discuss what they're watching in tech stocks amid the coronavirus outbreak.

title: Facebook closes London offices until Monday due to coronavirus
text: Facebook said on Friday it is closing its London offices until Monday after a visiting employee from Singapore was diagnosed with coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Facebook Closes London Offices After Employee Diagnosed
text: Facebook is closing its three London offices after one of its employees tested positive for coronavirus. The social media giant has told its 3,000 employees to work from home until Monday. Facebook told Sky News, “An employee based in our Singapore office who has been diagnosed with COVID-19 visited our London offices 24-26 February 2020.

title: Facebook Earnings, Revenue Estimates Cut On Coronavirus Concerns
text:
Facebook stock fell as a Wall Street analyst lowered estimates on revenue and earnings due to the Covid-19 impact as advertisers, which make up the bulk of Facebook's revenue, have cut back.
The post Facebook Earnings, Revenue Estimates Cut On Coronavirus Concerns appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

title: Facebook will suffer a coronavirus-related hit to its ads business, Needham analysts say
text: Needham analysts lowered Facebook revenue and earnings per share estimates for the first half of the year as consumer demand falls and ad projections start to decline.

title: Coronavirus:  Facebook closes London offices after employee diagnosed
text: Facebook is closing its London offices and telling staff to work from home after an employee was diagnosed with COVID-19.
